title: Covid-19 live updates: China’s world-beating vaccination campaign comes with caveats
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: China’s world-beating vaccination campaign comes with caveats  The Washington Post
  2. World Health Organization authorizes China's Sinovac Covid-19 vaccine for emergency use  CNN
  3. Inside a plant in China producing the WHO-approved Sinovac Covid-19 vaccine  South China Morning Post
  4. Covid-19 Pandemic: Live Updates and News for Jun. 2, 2021  Bloomberg
  5. Coronavirus latest: Lonza to make Moderna vaccine ingredients  Nikkei Asia
